page.title: 20A Newcomer to Newent
page.content: I came to Newent three years ago with my family when my firm moved to Gloucester. I decided to live in Newent because it is such a pleasant part of the country. It is near my work there are good schools and for its size Newent has more facilities than one would expect to find in a community of this size. There is the Sports Centre, Community Centre, many clubs and societies and an extremely good range of shops and services. I find the people very friendly and we already feel part of the local scene. There is an added bonus in that one has only to travel a few miles in either direction for a complete scenery change. There is the Forest of Dean to the south, Gloucester and the Cotswold Hills to the east and to the west the hills of Wales are within easy reach for a day out.
